name: uHIT
description:
Start playing uHIT today - used by hitters of all levels. Built for MLB players!

With over a million pitches to play, you call balls and strikes from the view a hitter has at the plate!

Fun for the fan and useful for the training hitter, this immersive simulation lets you train zone and pitch recognition.

Need to speed up your Reaction Time to a 95mph fastball? Do that in Reaction Time Enhancement in uHIT.

Need to work on 76mph curveballs low and outside? Do that too in Hitter’s Eye Zone Enhancement in UHIT.

Want to get your zone recognition skills recognized by MLB teams? Get a Pro Player Subscription to uHIT and compete in uHIT’s Strike Recognition game.

FREE to download, uHIT offers in-app purchases after a 24-hr trial of the Pro Player Subscription.

Check out the app preview images and videos to see how fun and easy it is to play uHIT.

uHIT features:

• Instant feedback on correct and incorrect calls
• Hitter’s Eye Zone Enhancement to work outer and inner zones, upper and lower zones
• Reaction Time Enhancement to recognize fast pitches sooner
• Change Pitch Settings to play against lefty and righty pitchers
• Customize uHIT to opposing pitchers and train your eyes in Hitter’s Eye Zone Enhancement
• Toggle between uHIT Softball and uHIT Baseball to get all these features for softball too!

Visit https://decervo.com/contact.html if you need help!
